column4: can i get some help installing RealPlayer11GOLD.bin please? the first instructions in the directions is 'install realplayer'
from the directory it is in, try running  sudo ./RealPlayer11GOLD.bin
ty - it's asking me where exactly i want it installed
i have it installed and i restarted firefox - the stream i'm trying to open is the one entitled 'spanair plane crash' in the top middle of the page - http://www.rte.ie/news/6news/
using some braindead imbedded thing - doesn't play here either
asking questions makes me braindead in a support channel?
no no - I meant the site' player thing :)
oh right the site, yeah i'd rather it worked out of the box :)
somebody said to install realplayer plugin
ya sorry, my bad, i realised it after i said it and before you did :)
